extends java.rmi.Remote

        Function which updates the current app server port on which the game is active
        Parameters:
        port - The port of the app server on which the game is active
        gameId - The identifier of the game

                     int currentVersion)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Function which checks the version of the game on other database servers
        Parameters:
        gameId - The identifier of the game
        currentVersion - The current version number of the game on this database server
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
